pageProduct.name: Amazonia RAW Slim & Tone Protein Vanilla Cinnamon Sachet 30g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Amazonia Raw Protein Slim & Tone has been designed to support a natural, healthy metabolism, while helping you to achieve real results you can feel. Specifically formulated with a sprouted and fermented protein base, nourishing trace minerals, nutrient-dense herbs, spices and alkaline greens, Raw Protein Slim & Tone may help keep your hunger satisfied, reduce feelings of cravings and assist in healthy, long-term toning, in combination with healthy eating and regular exercise.

Warnings

Formulated Supplementary Sports Foods. Not a sole source of nutrition. Should be consumed in conjunction with a nutritious diet and appropriate exercise program. Not suitable for children under 15 years of age or pregnant women. Should only be used under medical or dietetic supervision.

Common Uses

Shakes, Smoothies, Coffee, Bread, Cakes, Cereal, Pancakes, Cookies

Ingredients

Organic Sprouted & Fermented Golden Pea Protein*, Natural Flavours, Superfood Blend (Organic Lucuma*, Sea Mineral Complex [74+ Trace Minerals], Organic Spinach*, Organic Spirulina*, Organic Chlorella*), Herb & Spice Blend (Organic Cinnamon*, Organic Liquorice*, Organic Ginger*, Organic Dandelion*, Organic Ginkgo Biloba*, Organic Siberian Ginseng*, Organic Milk Thistle*, Organic Cayenne Pepper*, Organic Gotu Kola*, Organic Cloves*), Organic Acacia Gum*, Organic Stevia Leaf Extract*, Digestive Enzyme (Bromelain). *Certified Organic

Directions

Blend sachet (30g), into 300ml of cold water in a shaker. Can also be taken with non-dairy milk or blended into smoothies.
